@InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value={"HBase","HDFS","MapReduce"}) @InterfaceStability.Evolving

Package org.apache.hadoop.security.token.delegation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDelegationTokenIdentifier  
    AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager<TokenIdent extends AbstractDelegationTokenIdentifier>  
    AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager.DelegationTokenInformation
    Class to encapsulate a token's renew date and password.
    AbstractDelegationTokenSelector<TokenIdent extends AbstractDelegationTokenIdentifier>
    Look through tokens to find the first delegation token that matches the service and return it.
    DelegationKey
    Key used for generating and verifying delegation tokens
    TestDelegationToken  
    TestDelegationToken.TestDelegationTokenIdentifier  
    TestDelegationToken.TestDelegationTokenSecretManager  
    TestDelegationToken.TokenSelector  
    TestZKDelegationTokenSecretManager  
    ZKDelegationTokenSecretManager<TokenIdent extends AbstractDelegationTokenIdentifier>
    An implementation of AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager that persists TokenIdentifiers and DelegationKeys in Zookeeper.
    ZKDelegationTokenSecretManager.JaasConfiguration
    Creates a programmatic version of a jaas.conf file.
    ZKDelegationTokenSecretManager.SASLOwnerACLProvider
    Simple implementation of an ACLProvider that simply returns an ACL that gives all permissions only to a single principal.
